column5: We decided to enjoy the great and unusual October Monday at Island Lake in Orangeville.  Check out my 8 year old with his new PB largemouth. 3 lbs on the digital scale  Love the wacky style fishing. Casted out on my 103HA Steez and Avid rod, watch the line go sideways and handed the rod to my son. We were using circle hooks and told him that you do not have to set the hook just start reeling in. The results after a couple minute fight and some great jumps:    Jose
Great report and pic jchau53  High five to your son for his PB    Real nice looking bass Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice size bass, not bad for Island Lake. Great to see the smile on the boy's face. Circle hooks are amazing, just a little harder to take them out.
Nice bass,i bet the young lad is still on cloud nine !!!!  ...he is sure smiling   ...it sure was a great day to be on the water...
Jose, you better watch out.  He'll be outfishing his oldman in no time
Congrats on the new PB little man. Island lake is one of my favourites.
WTG on your PB congrats to your son  Rob
Good to see the young lad grinnin ear to ear. A day like that is worth more than money in the bank. WTG
Very nice Bass, I always wanted to try that lake and never knew anyone who fished it!
W.T.G glad to hear the young lads hooked  Hawg Hunter
Big smile for a big Bass, congrats on his PB...
Nice Largie! Congrats on the PB... uhmmm, what's with the "glove" holding the fish... I've only once met another "man" who used a glove to hold fish... he's still hearing about it! LOL HH
Very nice.  Think I'll drop in there on my way up to my parents.
Congratulations to you and your son! There isn't much better than a day like that. Jim
WTG on the PB largemouth bass. It must of been a great fight!
Nice catch    I never caught fish that size until I was 12 I think. congratulations
